QuestData.Title: To the Rescue!
QuestData.Description: You're coming with me, $n.$b$bThere's no one else that I can spare, and we cannot afford for Splintertree to be lost.$b$bPrepare yourself, and speak to me again when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Kadrak at Mor'shan Ramparts and accompany him to Splintertree Post.
QuestData.RewardText: Gorka's death was not in vain, $n.$b$bSplintertree would have certainly fallen if we hadn't come when we did.$b$bNow we must get to work shoring up her defenses.$b$bThis isn't over....
